comments.body: Instead of disabling it, how about we convert it to a regular `test` (it will not use Hive for the golden answers and we can use `checkAnswer`)?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -472,7 +475,7 @@ class HiveWindowFunctionQuerySuite extends HiveComparisonTest with BeforeAndAfte
       |window w1 as (distribute by p_mfgr sort by p_mfgr, p_name
       |             rows between 2 preceding and 2 following)
     """.stripMargin, reset = false)
-
+  */

comments.body: I have added a statistical test case to the `DataFrameWindowSuite`, this however doesn't match the level of thoroughness of the disabled tests. I have tried to add these tests verbatim to a separate test suite, but this becomes quite verbose and ugly (in style) and I rather not add this. I could expand the tests in the `DataFrameWindowSuite`.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -472,7 +475,7 @@ class HiveWindowFunctionQuerySuite extends HiveComparisonTest with BeforeAndAfte
       |window w1 as (distribute by p_mfgr sort by p_mfgr, p_name
       |             rows between 2 preceding and 2 following)
     """.stripMargin, reset = false)
-

comments.body: @yhuai I have added the tests anyway. The result is quite bulky.
